titleStmt.title: Chauncey McKeever to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG12055

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 1st - 20th Regiments Kentucky Infantry Primary Source Documents

body.p:
Adjutant General's Office,
Washington, September 22d 1863.
To His Excellency,
The Governor of Kentucky,
Sir:

I have the honor to report, that the following named Officers of the Volunteer forces from the State of Kentucky -- haves resigned, to take effect at the dates set opposite their^his^ respective names, viz:
For promotion, ✓ Lieut Colonel Frank P. Cahill ✓ 1 Regt Aug 17 1863.

I am Sir
Very respectfully
Your Obt Servant
Chauncey McKeever
Asst Adjt General.

1
No 132
Washington City Report
ResigS
Filed 5th Decr 1863
